pullrequest.title: Port SDF Filesystem to Ignition Common

content.raw:
Yeah true, but I think the while is not that long, see [this](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/ignition_common-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/30/) blue build still in the visible horizon. 

It had been fixed by pull request #33. I'll prepare a new pull request which does the same as that one and isolates some classes.

I think we should at least try to make sure new pull requests don't break the Windows build _even more_, because we're just accumulating things to fix in the future. This is especially important for common, because many other libraries depend on this one and this is blocking them building on Windows.
content.html:
Yeah true, but I think the while is not that long, see this blue build still in the visible horizon.

It had been fixed by pull request #33. I'll prepare a new pull request which does the same as that one and isolates some classes.

I think we should at least try to make sure new pull requests don't break the Windows build even more, because we're just accumulating things to fix in the future. This is especially important for common, because many other libraries depend on this one and this is blocking them building on Windows.
